article_title: Thank you for fine medical care
article_text:
File (Photo: Getty Images/iStockphoto)

On a recent Sunday morning, I needed medical help and went to the Emergency Room at Riverview Hospital.

Fantastic was the way I was treated. The nurses, doctor and techs went above and beyond to take care of me.

I do not know all of their names but wish to thank them.

So folks, you do not have to go out of town for the best medical help. It’s right here in Wisconsin Rapids.

Dick Heiser,

Wisconsin Rapids

Read or Share this story: http://wrtnews.co/1JkYwqz

article_metadata.description: Local resident thankful for care at Riverview Hospital.
